name: Whole-Wheat Couscous Salad
keywords: summer, sun-dried tomato, tomato, wheat couscous
recipeIngredient: 3 sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, cut in a fine julienne
1/2 large ripe tomato, cut in small cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Follow couscous package directions for proper amount of water. When water boils, add couscous and cumin, cover and cook as directed. Remove from heat.
Stir in sun-dried tomatoes, ripe tomato, scallions and salt, if desired.
